full_text: 02/20/2008 23:00 FAX RICCI LEOPOLD COMMITTED TO JUSTICE, TRUTH & SAFETY 001 RICCI~LEOPOLD CONSUMER JUSTICE ATTORNEYS February 21, 2008 VIA: FACSIMILE & U.S. MAIL Jack A. Goldberger, Esq. Atterbury, Goldberger, et al 250 S Australian Ave Ste 1400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401-5015 Re: Jane Doe v. Epstein Dear Jack: This letter is written due to the deep and serious concern about the ethics of your co-counsel. Because your co-counsel refused to provide copies of the documents and photographs used in his direct examination of yesterday to the State Attorney or me, which is the professional and customary thing to do, and the fact that he refused to even allow the court reporter to mark the documents as exhibits I am quite fearful we may never see the exhibits again. Therefore I am compelled to write this letter to confirm that you have agreed that you will provide the State Attorney and me copies of all the exhibits, properly identified, that were used during the direct examination. Very truly yours, THEODORE J. LEOPOLD TJL:ms cc: Michael Tein, Esq. (via facsimile and regular mail) Lanna Belohlavek, Esq. (via facsimile and regular mail) 2925 PGA Boulevard Suite 200 Palm Beach Gardens Florida 33410 561.684.6500 fax 561.697.2383 riccilaw.com CRASHWORTHINESS · INSURANCE BAD FAITH · MANAGED CARE ABUSE · PERSONAL INJURY DOJ-OGR-00031537

text_blocks.content: 02/20/2008 23:00 FAX RICCI LEOPOLD COMMITTED TO JUSTICE, TRUTH & SAFETY 001 RICCI~LEOPOLD CONSUMER JUSTICE ATTORNEYS
VIA: FACSIMILE & U.S. MAIL Jack A. Goldberger, Esq. Atterbury, Goldberger, et al 250 S Australian Ave Ste 1400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401-5015 Re: Jane Doe v. Epstein

This letter is written due to the deep and serious concern about the ethics of your co-counsel. Because your co-counsel refused to provide copies of the documents and photographs used in his direct examination of yesterday to the State Attorney or me, which is the professional and customary thing to do, and the fact that he refused to even allow the court reporter to mark the documents as exhibits I am quite fearful we may never see the exhibits again.

Therefore I am compelled to write this letter to confirm that you have agreed that you will provide the State Attorney and me copies of all the exhibits, properly identified, that were used during the direct examination.
Very truly yours, THEODORE J. LEOPOLD
TJL:ms cc: Michael Tein, Esq. (via facsimile and regular mail) Lanna Belohlavek, Esq. (via facsimile and regular mail)
2925 PGA Boulevard Suite 200 Palm Beach Gardens Florida 33410 561.684.6500 fax 561.697.2383 riccilaw.com CRASHWORTHINESS · INSURANCE BAD FAITH · MANAGED CARE ABUSE · PERSONAL INJURY

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Theodore J. Leopold to Jack A. Goldberger regarding concerns about the ethics of co-counsel in the case Jane Doe v. Epstein. The letter is on Ricci Leopold letterhead and includes contact information. There is a handwritten signature and initials on the document.
